glosses: To sleep in the same bed with someone.
To sleep with someone, to have sexual intercourse with someone.
To lay siege to, to besiege a place.

etymology: From compound of koyun (“bosom, chest”) + -u (possessive suffix) + -(n)a (dative suffix with "n" as buffer consonant) + almak (“to take, to receive”), literally “to take into one's bosom”. Cognate with Kazakh қойнына алу (qoinyna alu).
